sentence.Network_en: He replied with characteristic insouciance: "So what?"
sentence.Network_cn: 他以一贯的漫不经心回答道：“那又怎样？”

sentence.Network_en: She hid her worries behind an air of insouciance.
sentence.Network_cn: 她掩饰着自己的烦恼，表现得无忧无虑。

sentence.Network_en: He replied with characteristic insouciance: 'So what?'
sentence.Network_cn: 他以一贯的漫不经心回答道：“那又怎样？”

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语学习资料收集 ... Cursory 草率的 Insouciance 漫不经心，无忧虑 Insouciant 漫不经心的.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... arrogance 傲慢，自大 insouciance 漠不关心 radiance 发光，喜悦.

... Secrets & Lies（ 秘密与谎言） | 年份：1996 | 英国 1. insouciance（ 不在乎） 2. unrestrained pessimism（ 没有束缚的消极）.

黄颀课堂讲义单词 - 豆丁网 ... nonchalant 冷漠的 insouciant 漫不经心的 check 突然停止， 阻止.
蓝宝词典 ... insolent adj. 粗野的，无礼的 insouciant adj. 无忧无虑的 instate vt. 任命.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: French, from insouciant, from in- 'not' + souciant 'worrying' (present participle of soucier)

entry.def: Insouciance is lack of concern shown by someone about something which they might be expected to take more seriously.

example.ex: He replied with characteristic insouciance: 'So what?'
example.tran: 他以一贯的漫不经心回答道：“那又怎样？”

means.word_mean: 1. the cheerful feeling you have when nothing is troubling you
